channel.title: 2 things
channel.description: Okay I have two questions. Does anyone know how to change the amout of exp given from cutting a tree? I want to be able to cut a regular tree and get like.....3k exp or something. Can someone help me? Also my other question was...When I compile my server, it doesn't load summonging....it says like config\objects.cfg: files not found. And then it says "Loaded 25 monsters from Summon.cfg" But....there's no summonging skill or anything.

item.title: 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Savyour Savyour
item.description:
@Savyour wrote:

Okay I have two questions. Does anyone know how to change the amout of exp given from cutting a tree? I want to be able to cut a regular tree and get like…3k exp or something.
Can someone help me?
Also my other question was…When I compile my server, it doesn’t load summonging…it says like config\objects.cfg: files not found.
And then it says “Loaded 25 monsters from Summon.cfg”
But…there’s no summonging skill or anything.

Read full topic
